data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Staines, Charles L., Garcia-Robledo, Carlos (2014): The genus Cephaloleia Chevrolat, 1836 (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Cassidinae). ZooKeys 436: 1-355, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.436.5766, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.436.5766
